summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $27.60 from the General Fund to be paid H. O. Hollenbeck as a refund of assessments paid on lots six (6) and seven (7), block one (1), Oakland Addition, for the laying of water mains in Melrose Avenue, et al under Ordinance No. 7045, creating Local Improvement District No. 455, and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the remaining portion of the assessment for said improvement against said property.
